verbs.description: [ARG0: White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders] [V: sparred] [ARG1: with a number of reporters] [ARGM-LOC: at Monday 's press briefing] [ARG2: over conflicting recollections regarding a meeting at Trump Tower as well as the president 's controversial tweet about his pardon power earlier in the day] .

White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders sparred with a number of reporters at Monday 's press briefing over [ARG0: conflicting recollections] [V: regarding] [ARG1: a meeting at Trump Tower as well as the president 's controversial tweet about his pardon power earlier in the day] .
